36 namespace TiledArray {
37 
38 /*
39  * btas::Tensor with UM storage cuda_um_btas_varray
40  */
41 
42 template <typename T, typename Range = TiledArray::Range>
43 using btasUMTensorVarray =
44  ::btas::Tensor<T, Range, TiledArray::cuda_um_btas_varray<T>>;
45 
46 template <typename T, typename Range>
47 struct eval_trait<
48  ::btas::Tensor<T, Range, TiledArray::cuda_um_btas_varray<T>>> {
49  typedef ::btas::Tensor<T, Range, TiledArray::cuda_um_btas_varray<T>> type;
50 };
51 
52 namespace detail {
53 template <typename T, typename Range>
54 struct is_cuda_tile<
55  ::btas::Tensor<T, Range, TiledArray::cuda_um_btas_varray<T>>>
56  : public std::true_type {};
57 
58 template <typename T>
59 void to_cuda(const TiledArray::btasUMTensorVarray<T> &tile) {
60  cudaSetDevice(TiledArray::cudaEnv::instance()->current_cuda_device_id());
61  auto &stream = TiledArray::detail::get_stream_based_on_range(tile.range());
62  TiledArray::to_execution_space<TiledArray::ExecutionSpace::CUDA>(
63  tile.storage(), stream);
64 }
65 
66 } // end of namespace detail
67 
68 } // end of namespace TiledArray
69 
71 namespace madness {
72 namespace archive {
73 
74 template <class Archive, typename T>
75 struct ArchiveLoadImpl<Archive, TiledArray::btasUMTensorVarray<T>> {
76  static inline void load(const Archive &ar,
77  TiledArray::btasUMTensorVarray<T> &t) {
78  TiledArray::Range range{};
79  TiledArray::cuda_um_btas_varray<T> store{};
80  ar &range &store;
81  t = TiledArray::btasUMTensorVarray<T>(std::move(range), std::move(store));
82  // cudaSetDevice(TiledArray::cudaEnv::instance()->current_cuda_device_id());
83  // auto &stream = TiledArray::detail::get_stream_based_on_range(range);
84  // TiledArray::to_execution_space<TiledArray::ExecutionSpace::CUDA>(t.storage(),
85  // stream);
86  }
87 };
88 
89 template <class Archive, typename T>
90 struct ArchiveStoreImpl<Archive, TiledArray::btasUMTensorVarray<T>> {
91  static inline void store(const Archive &ar,
92  const TiledArray::btasUMTensorVarray<T> &t) {
93  CudaSafeCall(cudaSetDevice(
94  TiledArray::cudaEnv::instance()->current_cuda_device_id()));
95  auto &stream = TiledArray::detail::get_stream_based_on_range(t.range());
96  TiledArray::to_execution_space<TiledArray::ExecutionSpace::CPU>(t.storage(),
97  stream);
98  ar &t.range() & t.storage();
99  }
100 };
101 
102 } // namespace archive
103 } // namespace madness

110 template <typename T, typename Scalar, typename Range>
111 btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> gemm(
112  const btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> &left,
113  const btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> &right, Scalar factor,
114  const TiledArray::math::GemmHelper &gemm_helper) {
115  return btas_tensor_gemm_cuda_impl(left, right, factor, gemm_helper);
116 }

119 void gemm(btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> &result,
120  const btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> &left,
121  const btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> &right, Scalar factor,
122  const TiledArray::math::GemmHelper &gemm_helper) {
123  return btas_tensor_gemm_cuda_impl(result, left, right, factor, gemm_helper);
124 }

130 template <typename T, typename Range>
131 btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> clone(const btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> &arg) {
132  // TODO how to copy Unified Memory? from CPU or GPU? currently
133  // always copy on GPU, but need to investigate
134  return btas_tensor_clone_cuda_impl(arg);
135 }
136 
140 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Index>
141 btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> shift(const btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> &arg,
142  const Index &range_shift) {
143  // make a copy of the old range
144  Range result_range(arg.range());
145  // shift the range
146  result_range.inplace_shift(range_shift);
147 
148  CudaSafeCall(cudaSetDevice(cudaEnv::instance()->current_cuda_device_id()));
149 
150  // @important select the stream using the shifted range
151  auto &cuda_stream = detail::get_stream_based_on_range(result_range);
152 
153  typename btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range>::storage_type result_storage;
154 
155  make_device_storage(result_storage, result_range.volume(), cuda_stream);
156  btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> result(std::move(result_range),
157  std::move(result_storage));
158 
159  // call cublasCopy
160  const auto &handle = cuBLASHandlePool::handle();
161  CublasSafeCall(cublasSetStream(handle, cuda_stream));
162 
163  CublasSafeCall(cublasCopy(handle, result.size(), device_data(arg.storage()),
164  1, device_data(result.storage()), 1));
165 
166  synchronize_stream(&cuda_stream);
167  return result;
168 }
169 
173 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Index>
174 btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> shift_to(btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> &arg,
175  const Index &range_shift) {
176  const_cast<Range &>(arg.range()).inplace_shift(range_shift);
177  return arg;
178 }
179 
183 
184 template <typename T, typename Range>
185 btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> permute(const btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> &arg,
186  const TiledArray::Permutation &perm) {
187  // compute result range
188  auto result_range = perm * arg.range();
189  CudaSafeCall(cudaSetDevice(cudaEnv::instance()->current_cuda_device_id()));
190 
191  // compute the stream to use
192  auto &stream = detail::get_stream_based_on_range(result_range);
193 
194  // allocate result memory
195  typename btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range>::storage_type storage;
196  make_device_storage(storage, result_range.area(), stream);
197 
198  btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> result(std::move(result_range),
199  std::move(storage));
200 
201  // invoke the permute function
202  cutt_permute(const_cast<T *>(device_data(arg.storage())),
203  device_data(result.storage()), arg.range(), perm, stream);
204 
205  synchronize_stream(&stream);
206 
207  return std::move(result);
208 }
209

214 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Scalar>
215 btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> scale(const btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> &arg,
216  const Scalar factor) {
217  detail::to_cuda(arg);
218  return btas_tensor_scale_cuda_impl(arg, factor);
219 }
220 
221 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Scalar>
222 void scale_to(btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> &arg, const Scalar factor) {
223  detail::to_cuda(arg);
224  btas_tensor_scale_to_cuda_impl(arg, factor);
225 }
226 
227 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Scalar>
228 btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> scale(const btasUMTensorVarray<T, Range> &arg,
229  const Scalar factor,
230  const TiledArray::Permutation &perm) {
231  auto result = scale(arg, factor);
232 
233  // wait to finish before switch stream
234  auto stream = tls_cudastream_accessor();
235  cudaStreamSynchronize(*stream);
236 
237  return permute(result, perm);
238 }

573 
575 template <typename UMTensor, typename Policy>
576 void to_host(
577  TiledArray::DistArray<TiledArray::Tile<UMTensor>, Policy> &um_array) {
578  auto to_host = [](TiledArray::Tile<UMTensor> &tile) {
579  CudaSafeCall(cudaSetDevice(cudaEnv::instance()->current_cuda_device_id()));
580  auto &stream = detail::get_stream_based_on_range(tile.range());
581 
582  TiledArray::to_execution_space<TiledArray::ExecutionSpace::CPU>(
583  tile.tensor().storage(), stream);
584  };
585 
586  auto &world = um_array.world();
587 
588  auto start = um_array.pmap()->begin();
589  auto end = um_array.pmap()->end();
590 
591  for (; start != end; ++start) {
592  if (!um_array.is_zero(*start)) {
593  world.taskq.add(to_host, um_array.find(*start));
594  }
595  }
596 
597  world.gop.fence();
598  CudaSafeCall(cudaDeviceSynchronize());
599 };
600 
602 template <typename UMTensor, typename Policy>
603 void to_device(
604  TiledArray::DistArray<TiledArray::Tile<UMTensor>, Policy> &um_array) {
605  auto to_device = [](TiledArray::Tile<UMTensor> &tile) {
606  CudaSafeCall(cudaSetDevice(cudaEnv::instance()->current_cuda_device_id()));
607  auto &stream = detail::get_stream_based_on_range(tile.range());
608 
609  TiledArray::to_execution_space<TiledArray::ExecutionSpace::CUDA>(
610  tile.tensor().storage(), stream);
611  };
612 
613  auto &world = um_array.world();
614 
615  auto start = um_array.pmap()->begin();
616  auto end = um_array.pmap()->end();
617 
618  for (; start != end; ++start) {
619  if (!um_array.is_zero(*start)) {
620  world.taskq.add(to_device, um_array.find(*start));
621  }
622  }
623 
624  world.gop.fence();
625  CudaSafeCall(cudaDeviceSynchronize());
626 };
627 
629 template <typename UMTensor, typename TATensor, typename Policy>
630 typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<UMTensor, TATensor>::value,
631  TiledArray::DistArray<TATensor, Policy>>::type
632 um_tensor_to_ta_tensor(
633  const TiledArray::DistArray<UMTensor, Policy> &um_array) {
634  const auto convert_tile_memcpy = [](const UMTensor &tile) {
635  TATensor result(tile.tensor().range());
636 
637  auto &stream = cudaEnv::instance()->cuda_stream_d2h();
638  CudaSafeCall(
639  cudaMemcpyAsync(result.data(), tile.data(),
640  tile.size() * sizeof(typename TATensor::value_type),
641  cudaMemcpyDefault, stream));
642  synchronize_stream(&stream);
643 
644  return std::move(result);
645  };
646 
647  const auto convert_tile_um = [](const UMTensor &tile) {
648  TATensor result(tile.tensor().range());
649  using std::begin;
650  const auto n = tile.tensor().size();
651 
652  CudaSafeCall(cudaSetDevice(cudaEnv::instance()->current_cuda_device_id()));
653  auto &stream = detail::get_stream_based_on_range(tile.range());
654 
655  TiledArray::to_execution_space<TiledArray::ExecutionSpace::CPU>(
656  tile.tensor().storage(), stream);
657 
658  std::copy_n(tile.data(), n, result.data());
659 
660  return std::move(result);
661  };
662 
663  const char *use_legacy_conversion =
664  std::getenv("TA_CUDA_LEGACY_UM_CONVERSION");
665  auto ta_array = use_legacy_conversion
666  ? to_new_tile_type(um_array, convert_tile_um)
667  : to_new_tile_type(um_array, convert_tile_memcpy);
668 
669  um_array.world().gop.fence();
670  return ta_array;
671 }
672 
674 template <typename UMTensor, typename TATensor, typename Policy>
675 typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<UMTensor, TATensor>::value,
676  TiledArray::DistArray<UMTensor, Policy>>::type
677 um_tensor_to_ta_tensor(
678  const TiledArray::DistArray<UMTensor, Policy> &um_array) {
679  return um_array;
680 }
681 
683 template <typename UMTensor, typename TATensor, typename Policy>
684 typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<UMTensor, TATensor>::value,
685  TiledArray::DistArray<UMTensor, Policy>>::type
686 ta_tensor_to_um_tensor(const TiledArray::DistArray<TATensor, Policy> &array) {
687  auto convert_tile_memcpy = [](const TATensor &tile) {
689 
690  CudaSafeCall(cudaSetDevice(cudaEnv::instance()->current_cuda_device_id()));
691 
692  using Tensor = typename UMTensor::tensor_type;
693 
694  auto &stream = cudaEnv::instance()->cuda_stream_h2d();
695  typename Tensor::storage_type storage;
696  make_device_storage(storage, tile.range().area(), stream);
697  Tensor result(tile.range(), std::move(storage));
698 
699  CudaSafeCall(
700  cudaMemcpyAsync(result.data(), tile.data(),
701  tile.size() * sizeof(typename Tensor::value_type),
702  cudaMemcpyDefault, stream));
703 
704  synchronize_stream(&stream);
705  return TiledArray::Tile<Tensor>(std::move(result));
706  };
707 
708  auto convert_tile_um = [](const TATensor &tile) {
710 
711  CudaSafeCall(cudaSetDevice(cudaEnv::instance()->current_cuda_device_id()));
712 
713  using Tensor = typename UMTensor::tensor_type;
714  typename Tensor::storage_type storage(tile.range().area());
715 
716  Tensor result(tile.range(), std::move(storage));
717 
718  const auto n = tile.size();
719 
720  std::copy_n(tile.data(), n, result.data());
721 
722  auto &stream = detail::get_stream_based_on_range(result.range());
723 
724  // prefetch data to GPU
725  TiledArray::to_execution_space<TiledArray::ExecutionSpace::CUDA>(
726  result.storage(), stream);
727 
728  return TiledArray::Tile<Tensor>(std::move(result));
729  };
730 
731  const char *use_legacy_conversion =
732  std::getenv("TA_CUDA_LEGACY_UM_CONVERSION");
733  auto um_array = use_legacy_conversion
734  ? to_new_tile_type(array, convert_tile_um)
735  : to_new_tile_type(array, convert_tile_memcpy);
736 
737  array.world().gop.fence();
738  return um_array;
739 }
740 
742 template <typename UMTensor, typename TATensor, typename Policy>
743 typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<UMTensor, TATensor>::value,
744  TiledArray::DistArray<UMTensor, Policy>>::type
745 ta_tensor_to_um_tensor(const TiledArray::DistArray<UMTensor, Policy> &array) {
746  return array;
747 }
748 
749 } // namespace TiledArray
